title: [FEATURE] Skottie: Expose lottie_autoPlay and lottie_loop attributes
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

I need to bind the zoom meeting sdk, and the two referenced attributes are missing from the Skottie API

**Describe the solution you'd like**

Add them in

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

<!-- A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered. -->

Adding them as blank boolean attributes in an xml resources file in my referencing project, just to get it building.
